tool_description: This is an Unofficial API for the Goone.pro (previously) Vidstreaming.io website. Get movie details, episodes and streaming links. Search anime by keyword, get top anime and ongoing anime.
name: ScappperAnime
title: ScappperAnime

api_list.name: Get new seasons
api_list.description: Get the list of newly released anime seasons

api_list.name: Get RAW Anime list
api_list.description: Get all the recently added RAW anime. "RAW anime" typically refers to anime that hasn't been dubbed or subtitled in a particular language. It means the original audio track and visuals are presented without any additional language translations or modifications.

api_list.name: Get popular Anime
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches a list of popular anime titles

api_list.name: Get movies
api_list.description: This endpoin fetches a list of recently added anime movies

api_list.name: Get ongoing anime
api_list.description: This enpoint fetches information of ongoing anime

api_list.name: Get Anime episode details
api_list.description: Use this enpoint to get anime episode details like title, streaming link, synopsis and other episodes list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scappperanime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/mashle-2nd-season-episode-11"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scappperanime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://scappperanime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/{animeid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scappperanime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Anime by keyword
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to  search for anime titles based on a keyword.

api_list.name: Get Dubbed Anime
api_list.description: Get all the dubbed anime. You can use the page query parameter to access different pages. each request will render results from one page

api_list.name: Get recent episodes
api_list.description: This enpoint of our API allows you to get all the latest Anime episodes from Vidstreaming(goone.pro).
